Title: Remote Code Execution
Description: A remote code execution vulnerability was found within the pg module when the remote database or query specifies a specially crafted column name.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 2.11.2, all versions starting from 3.0.0 before 3.6.4, all versions starting from 4.0.0 before 4.5.7, all versions starting from 5.0.0 before 5.2.1, all versions starting from 6.0.0 before 6.0.5, all versions starting from 6.1.0 before 6.1.6, all versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.5, all versions starting from 6.3.0 before 6.3.3, all versions starting from 6.4.0 before 6.4.2, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.0.2, all versions starting from 7.1.0 before 7.1.2
Solution: Upgrade to one of the fixed versions.
